about_the_game:
Halloween is coming, and it’s the perfect time to set out on a mystical adventure! Halloween Night 2 Mahjong is a fantastic gift for all fans of classic puzzles. Get closely acquainted with the traditions of Halloween and get your bag of treats ready!

Here you will find the most varied Mahjong deals ever! Levels for any taste: from easy and classical to elegant with a mystical theme. Fast blitz levels to pass a spare minute, and multi-layer levels with huge deals of 200 tiles! What else do you need for long evenings?

Enjoy over 8 hours of adventure, 6 varied locations and 120 unique levels! Get ready to see the most mysterious places: a ghost town, an enchanted forest, a vampire castle and much more! Dive into an exciting atmosphere of this mystical holiday with Halloween Night 2 Mahjong!

- collect golden tiles to complete levels
- remove bonus tiles and get additional coins and bonuses
- remove tiles faster to increase your combo multiplier and earn more coins
- 6 locations, 120 levels and multiple difficulty modes
- a Halloween atmosphere in every game!
- colorful premium-quality graphics
- original themed tiles and 3 styles of tile suit
- beautiful music which doesn't distract you from playing

name: Halloween Night Mahjong 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: A Halloween atmosphere in every level! Ready to fight a mighty sorceress! Complete 120 unique levels of Mahjong!
